sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_ac7cac3c0feacf00303691dbe1050e28
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_to>set</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable>IO:45de23264f3943801674b47f0210c7fe</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Set filter for u_access_name</name><order>200</order><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
	   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }
	
    //Apply a filter to the list collector variable
    var collectorName = 'u_access_name';
    var filterString = 'u_system_name='+newValue;
   
	//Reset Slush bucket after 
	var leftBucket = gel(collectorName + '_select_0');  
    var rightBucket = gel(collectorName + '_select_1');   
	var selectedOptions = rightBucket.options;
 
	//Get an array of all option IDs to move
	var selectedIDs = [];
	var index = 0;
	for(var i = 0; i < selectedOptions.length; i++){
		selectedIDs[index] = i;
		index++;
	}
	moveSelectedOptions(selectedIDs, rightBucket, leftBucket, '--None--');

	
    //Try Service Portal method
    try{
        var myListCollector = g_list.get(collectorName);
        myListCollector.reset();
        myListCollector.setQuery(filterString);
		myListCollector.refresh();
    }
    //Revert to Service Catalog method
    catch(e){
        window[collectorName + 'g_filter'].reset();
        window[collectorName + 'g_filter'].setQuery(filterString);
        window[collectorName + 'acRequest'](null);
}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>bradley03</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-11-17 20:00:49</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>ac7cac3c0feacf00303691dbe1050e28</sys_id><sys_mod_count>20</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set filter for u_access_name</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_ac7cac3c0feacf00303691dbe1050e28</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>bradley03</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-11-19 20:45:27</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set display_value="System Access Request">2d7778ae0ff9c780303691dbe1050e0e</variable_set><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_4f9f3a050f8c8300303691dbe1050e6c
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.SarAccessLookup</api_name><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>SarAccessLookup</name><script><![CDATA[function SarAccessLookup(){
	var speclist= '';
	//var u_system_name = current.variables.answer1;
	var u_system_name = current.variable_pool.u_system_name;
	//gs.log('system_name '+u_system_name);
	//g_form.getDisplayBox('u_sar_system_details').u_system_name;
	var catlist = new GlideRecord('u_sar_system_details');
	catlist.addQuery('u_system_name_2',u_system_name);
	catlist.orderByDesc('u_access_name');
	catlist.query();
	

	
	
	while(catlist.next()) {
		//build a comma separated string of users
		speclist += (catlist.sys_id + ',');
	}
	// return a list of user id's for the selected company
	//gs.log('speclist '+speclist);
	return 'sys_idIN' + speclist;	
} ]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>nikolaus01</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-07-17 18:45:45</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>4f9f3a050f8c8300303691dbe1050e6c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>26</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SarAccessLookup</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_4f9f3a050f8c8300303691dbe1050e6c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>bradley03</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-10-17 14:17:26</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="DELETE"><active>false</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="SAR Request Form">7b933a510f44c300303691dbe1050e76</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:ce84b2910f44c300303691dbe1050e34</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Set Env by Access Name</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
  
	var caller = g_form.getReference('u_access_name', doShowEnv);
  // var selectedSystem = g_form.getValue('answer1');// doAlert is our callback function
}
function doShowEnv(caller) { //reference is passed into callback as first arguments
	
	//g_form.clearOptions('environment_two');
	
  if (caller.u_prod == 'true'){
	 // g_form.addOption('environment_two', 'Prod', 'value1');
      g_form.setVisible('u_prod', true);
} else { g_form.setVisible('u_prod', false);
		// g_form.removeOption('environment_two','prod_two');
	   } 
	
  if (caller.u_stage == 'true'){
      g_form.setVisible('u_stage', true);
} else { g_form.setVisible('u_stage', false);} 
	
	if (caller.u_test == 'true'){
      g_form.setVisible('u_test', true);
} else { g_form.setVisible('u_test', false);} 
	
	 if (caller.u_dev == 'true'){
      g_form.setVisible('u_dev', true);
} else { g_form.setVisible('u_dev', false);} 
	
	/*if (caller.u_system_name == 'Great Plains'){
      g_form.setVisible('company', true);
} else { g_form.setVisible('company', false);} 
	*/
	if (caller.u_system_name == 'Databases'){
      g_form.setVisible('db_role', true);
} else { g_form.setVisible('db_role', false);} 
	
/*	if (caller.u_system_name == 'Great Plains'){
       g_form.setVisible('cstwo', true);
		g_form.setVisible('cetwo', true);
} else { g_form.setVisible('cstwo', false);
	      g_form.setVisible('cetwo', false);} 
	
	if (caller.u_system_name == 'Databases'){
       g_form.setVisible('csthree', true);
		g_form.setVisible('cethree', true);
} else { g_form.setVisible('csthree', false);
	      g_form.setVisible('cethree', false);} 
	*/
}


]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>bradley03</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-07-25 00:02:32</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>d71b84a34fc00b001674b47f0210c70e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>66</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set Env by Access Name</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_d71b84a34fc00b001674b47f0210c70e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>bradley03</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-11-17 00:05:09</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="DELETE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_to>set</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable>IO:45de23264f3943801674b47f0210c7fe</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Set Role</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
    //Apply a filter to the list collector variable
    var collectorName = 'u_access_name';
    var filterString = 'u_system_name='+newValue;
   
    //Try Service Portal method
    try{
        var myListCollector = g_list.get(collectorName);
        myListCollector.reset();
        myListCollector.setQuery(filterString);
    }
    //Revert to Service Catalog method
    catch(e){
        window[collectorName + 'g_filter'].reset();
        window[collectorName + 'g_filter'].setQuery(filterString);
        window[collectorName + 'acRequest'](null);
}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>bradley03</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-11-17 02:15:52</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>71b830280fa2cf00303691dbe1050e39</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set Role</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_71b830280fa2cf00303691dbe1050e39</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>bradley03</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-11-17 02:15:52</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set display_value="System Access Request">2d7778ae0ff9c780303691dbe1050e0e</variable_set><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_c6a09f240f2acf00303691dbe1050edf
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_to>set</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable>IO:45de23264f3943801674b47f0210c7fe</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Add Envs</name><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }

   var u_system_name = g_form.getReference('u_system_name');
	
   if (u_system_name.u_prod == 'true') {
	g_form.setDisplay('u_prod', true);} else {g_form.setDisplay('u_prod', false);}

	if (u_system_name.u_stage == 'true') {
	g_form.setDisplay('u_stage', true);} else {g_form.setDisplay('u_stage', false);}

	if (u_system_name.u_test == 'true') {
	g_form.setDisplay('u_test', true);} else {g_form.setDisplay('u_test', false);}

	if (u_system_name.u_dev == 'true') {
	g_form.setDisplay('u_dev', true);} else {g_form.setDisplay('u_dev', false);}
	
	if (u_system_name.u_other_environments == 'true') {
	g_form.setDisplay('u_environments', true);
	g_form.setMandatory('u_environments', true);} else {g_form.setDisplay('u_environments', false); 
														g_form.setMandatory('u_environments', false);}
	

}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>bradley03</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-11-17 13:20:37</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>c6a09f240f2acf00303691dbe1050edf</sys_id><sys_mod_count>38</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Add Envs</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_c6a09f240f2acf00303691dbe1050edf</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>bradley03</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-11-19 19:24:51</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set display_value="System Access Request">2d7778ae0ff9c780303691dbe1050e0e</variable_set><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_70f82ee40fd80300303691dbe1050eee
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="DELETE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="SAR Request Form">7b933a510f44c300303691dbe1050e76</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><messages/><name>Manipulate Slushbucket Size</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad(){
     var varName = 'company';
     var height = '100'; //Optional
     var width = '250'; //Optional
     try{
         //Get the left and right bucket input elements
         var leftBucket = $(varName + '_select_0');
         var rightBucket = $(varName + '_select_1');
         
         //If the element exists
         if(leftBucket){
             //Adjust the bucket height (default is 300px)
             if(height){
                 leftBucket.style.height = height + 'px';
                 rightBucket.style.height = height + 'px';
             }
             
             if(width){
                 //Adjust the bucket width (default is 340px)
                 leftBucket.style.width = width + 'px';
                 rightBucket.style.width = width + 'px';
                                 //Fix Fuji/Geneva width issue
                                 leftBucket.up('.slushbucket').style.width = width*2 + 100 + 'px';
             }
             
             //Fix the expanding item preview issue
             $(varName + 'recordpreview').up('td').setAttribute('colSpan', '3');
         }
     }catch(e){}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>nikolaus01</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-07-28 14:05:38</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>70f82ee40fd80300303691dbe1050eee</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Manipulate Slushbucket Size</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_70f82ee40fd80300303691dbe1050eee</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>nikolaus01</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-07-28 14:05:38</sys_updated_on><table/><type/><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_b2357f2a4f3943801674b47f0210c7f6
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.SarDBRoleLookup</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>SarDBRoleLookup</name><script><![CDATA[function SarDBRoleLookup(){
	var speclist= '';
	var u_access_name = current.variable_pool.u_access_name;
	gs.log('access_name '+u_access_name);

	var catlist = new GlideRecord('u_sar_database_role');
	catlist.addQuery('u_server',u_access_name);
	catlist.orderByDesc('u_access_name');
	catlist.query();
	

	
	
	while(catlist.next()) {
		//build a comma separated string of users
		speclist += (catlist.sys_id + ',');
	}
	// return a list of user id's for the selected company
	gs.log('speclist '+speclist);
	return 'sys_idIN' + speclist;	
} ]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>bradley03</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-10-17 14:20:16</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>b2357f2a4f3943801674b47f0210c7f6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SarDBRoleLookup</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_b2357f2a4f3943801674b47f0210c7f6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>bradley03</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2017-10-17 14:20:16</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
